name: Fragmentia (NamelessNoun, zeroyuki92)
description:
Peter wakes up in a hospital bed after an accident that took his parents and his memories, his uncle the only person who he can turn to. After physically recovering, he spends his days at his uncle's house where depression, loneliness, and anxiety plague his existence. 

Lacking a sense of purpose and of self, Peter longs for a normal life. But he’s forced to move to a boarding school by his uncle due to work. Once there, he begins to meet Sarah, Jennifer and Danielle who begin to bring him out of his shell. Can he actually find a new fulfilling life? Friends? Happiness? Love? Can he create... memories?

Sarah is a bohemian. She is a creative loner who loves to create art, loves nature, and enjoys looking at the world in a different way. Can you find who Sarah is?

Danielle is dry as a desert. She's secretive and not very approachable, but she's a hard worker who also enjoys gaming. Could you ever beat her?

Jennifer is gregarious. She loves spending time with her friends, loves swimming and dancing, and enjoys cooking. Is it possible for you to keep up with her?

[Game in progress]

This is a demo, the full game is in progress and subject to change in the final build. The final result will be a free game.

45,000 words

Section into each girl's route
